title: New Shimano GRX adds wide range 12-speed gearing, uses Microspline freehub
content:
GRX 12-speed receives key updates that add substantial range to their 1x drivetrains, new wheels, and more.

Read the full article at New Shimano GRX adds wide range 12-speed gearing, uses Microspline freehub on Velo.
author: Alvin Holbrook
